memories.summary: On January 8, 2025, in Banff National Park, Daniel stood on a frozen lake, photographing snow-covered peaks under a bright winter sun.
On February 11, 2025, in New York, Daniel captured the skyline from the Brooklyn Bridge at sunrise, the sky glowing orange and gold.
On March 18, 2025, in Marrakech, Daniel photographed vibrant markets filled with spices, textiles, and colorful lamps.
On April 22, 2025, in Rome, Daniel took street photos of daily life near the Colosseum, capturing tourists and locals crossing sunlit cobblestones.
On May 26, 2025, in Santorini, Daniel photographed white cliffside houses against the blue Aegean Sea at sunset.
On June 14, 2025, in Kyoto, Daniel captured a series of temple photos framed by red torii gates and green mossy gardens.
On July 19, 2025, in Sydney, Daniel photographed surfers riding waves near Bondi Beach under bright summer skies.
On September 2, 2025, in Cape Town, Daniel hiked Table Mountain with his camera gear, taking panoramic shots of the coastline below.
On October 10, 2025, in Reykjavik, Daniel photographed the Northern Lights, green waves of light rippling above the icy landscape.
On December 28, 2025, in Ann Arbor, Daniel curated his annual photo exhibition, showcasing framed prints from around the world to a local audience.

qa_pairs.question: Which continents did Daniel visit for photography in 2025?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: North America (Canada, U.S.), Africa (Morocco, South Africa), Europe (Italy, Greece, Iceland), Asia (Japan), and Australia (Sydney).

qa_pairs.question: What types of photography did Daniel explore throughout the year?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Landscape, cityscape, street, cultural, architectural, action, and night sky photography.

qa_pairs.question: Which memories show Daniel collaborating or sharing his work with others?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Hiking with Olivia in Cape Town and exhibiting photos with Olivia and Maya in Ann Arbor.

qa_pairs.question: Which locations best demonstrate Daniel's focus on natural beauty?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Banff, Santorini, Cape Town, and Reykjavik, where he photographed mountains, sunsets, coastlines, and the Northern Lights.

qa_pairs.question: What shows Daniel's evolution from traveler to professional photographer?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: He began documenting his travels independently and ended the year hosting a curated photo exhibition in Ann Arbor.
